title: Proverb of the day: Like winter nights, long and cold زى ليالى الشتا طويلة و باردة - Folk Arts - Folk
text:
زى ليالى الشتا طويلة و باردة
Zayy Layali el sheta, tawila we barda
Translation: Like winter nights, long and cold.
Meaning: This is less of a proverb and more of a literary image. It can describe anything that is tortuous and seemingly endless and is used more in writing than in speech.
Source: Egyptian Proverbs, (Al-Ahram Center for Translation and Publishing, 1986) by Ahmed Taymour Pasha
Translated by: Nabil Shawkat
